sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_nse_defaulted_broker"> <x_0586_nse_defaulted_broker action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <date_of_declaration>2020-04-29</date_of_declaration> <defaulter_members>QUANTUM GLOBAL SECURITIES LIMITED</defaulter_members> <directors_partners>ATUL NARENDRA MALIK PANKAJ KUMAR SINGH BHAVESH KUMAR SINGH SHIPRA KASANA NITESH PRATAP MALIK</directors_partners> <number>DEF0001018</number> <reasons_for_declaring_the_member_as_defaulter>1) Misuse and Non-availability of client funds and securities 2) Non-settlement of client accounts 3) Shortfall in net worth 4) Falsification of books of accounts and Register of Securities of Clients 5) Failure to resolve investor complaints</reasons_for_declaring_the_member_as_defaulter> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-02-27 13:37:32</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7eb164bb2f71091051dad5f62799b662</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-02-27 13:37:32</sys_updated_on> </x_0586_nse_defaulted_broker> </record_update>
